title: ice: cfi: `encode_region: unexpected ReEarlyBound(0, 'a)`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code `rustc -Clto -Zsanitizer=cfi` ```Rust pub trait MyTrait<'a> { type Output: 'a; fn gimme_value(&self) -> Self::Output; } pub struct MyStruct; impl<'a> MyTrait<'a> for MyStruct { type Output = &'a usize; fn gimme_value(&self) -> Self::Output { unimplemented!() } } fn meow(t: T, f: F) where T: for<'any> MyTrait<'any>, F: for<'any2> Fn(>::Output), { let v = t.gimme_value(); f(v); } fn main() { let struc = MyStruct; meow(struc, |foo| {}) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (077fc26f0 2023-05-12) binary: rustc commit-hash: 077fc26f0acfa54e9c580534616c17ffc279a9d4 commit-date: 2023-05-12 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
